name: Sirvo Job Search
author: Sirvo

sections.description: Display your Restaurant and Hospitality jobs to promote your open positions directly on your WordPress website. Your active jobs will be pulled directly from your Sirvo account. Register your free account at https://app.sirvo.com/register-business
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/wp-sirvo directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->Plugin Name screen to configure the plugin by logging into your Sirvo account.
  4. If you don’t have a Sirvo account register for free here: https://app.sirvo.com/register-business
sections.faq:
Do I need to have a Sirvo account to use this plugin?

Yes, you can register for your free account here https://app.sirvo.com/register-business

Can I create multiple careers pages?

Yes. But you will need to create a new page first then add in the shortcode in the body of the page [sirvo_job_posts business_ids=”YOUR BUSINESS ID’S HERE SEPERATED BY A COMMA”]
